Articles.Content:
Started off the year with the film The Astronaut Farmer 2006. This film needs to be kerbaled (is that a term? ;>) and corrected slightly.

My rockets in KSP tip over and explode not skid along.

Where was the orbital burn at or near apoapsis?

Retrograde burn then just fall straight down out of the sky.

Recover within driving distance (must of had fancy transponder).

The scenes on the ranch are just full of that kerbal can do atittude. It is warm and enriching that the entire family is completely in tune with the idea of the journey.

Now after this movie, more than ever, I want to launch Jeb from a barn.
Everyime Bruce Willis shows up any realism gets purged from a movie.
bruce willis was in it? i didnt notice.

bruce willis was in it? i didnt notice.

Me either?
Yea he was the official astronaut who came and told him he couldn't do it.
I would have liked it more if it wasn't full of libertarian bull****.
